name: AAFTAB-E-ALAM SOCIAL WELFARE SOCIETY
briefDescription: AAFTAB-E-ALAM SOCIAL WELFARE SOCIETY (AEASWS) is a voluntary organisation (NGO), which was registered in 2012 under the West Bengal Societies Registration Act (1961).Our aim is to help women to become self-employed and stand equal to their male counterparts.Under privileged student development Society DevlopmentMajor Projects areScholarship Awarness, Assistance in scholarship Form fill up, Career Counsdeling (Career Margdarshan), Health Check-up Camps, Quiz,Debate,Essay writting, Drawing (Inter school/ Block /District / state)We provide information about scholarships â€“ right from class 1 to PhD levelWe keep students informed about their dates as well as new scholarships that come up to provide financial help to the needy.
